changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tax_forms ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, status VARCHAR NOT NULL DEFAULT 'NOT_STARTED', form_year INT NOT NULL, form_name VARCHAR NOT NULL, details JSONB, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), CHECK ( status IN ( 'NOT_STARTED', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'SUBMITTED', 'RETURNED', 'ACCEPTED' ) ) ); CREATE TABLE tax_form_history ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), type VARCHAR NOT NULL DEFAULT 'SUBMITTED', tax_form_id INT NOT NULL CONSTRAINT fk_c REFERENCES tax_forms (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CHECK ( type IN ( 'SUBMITTED', 'RETURNED', 'ACCEPTED' ) ) );
